commit message: Updated README.md and fixed a typo in the changelog.

Added missing license file.
Added Travis integration (possibly not working yet).

Added automatic signing to the build system for release builds.
Fixed a crash which could occur in rare cases.

Version bump to 2.0.2.
Added crash reporting capabilities with ACRA and added relevant settings.
Hopefully fixed a bug caused by non-square icons.

Version 2.0.2.
Integrated Travis-CI to the GitHub repository to perform automatic builds.
Updated Polish translation.
Miscanellous bugfixes (crashes related to VectorDrawables, non-square icons and absent NetworkInfo).
